SunSched.Description: When disabled, Abigail won't follow the Adventurer schedule on Sundays, which may slow or prevent progression of this mod's events.

TueSched.Description: When disabled, Abigail won't follow the Adventurer schedule on Tuesdays, which may slow or prevent progression of this mod's events.

ThuSched.Description: When disabled, Abigail won't follow the Adventurer schedule on the 18th of each season, which may prevent progression of this mod's events.

RainSched.Description: When disabled, Abigail won't follow the Adventurer schedule on rainy days.

GuildSched.Description: When disabled, Abigail won't occasionally help manage the Guild Shop.

EditEvents.Description: When disabled, Abigail's vanilla 10-heart and 14-heart events won't be edited to match this mod.

DialoguePatches.Description: When disabled, dialogue added by this mod won't be applied. Does not include conversation topics.

CrossoverContent.Description: When disabled, crossover content will not occur. Does not include compatibility patches.
